effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 1 million over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 523,416.

Set: When your Power Word: Shield is completely absorbed on an ally, they are granted Insurance! at 40% effectiveness. Allies with your Insurance! or absorption effects receive 15% increased healing from you.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Use: Deal yourself in, granting you 7,635 to 9,331 Mastery for 15 sec and stacking the deck. Stacking the deck increases the minimum Mastery on future hands by 283 until you leave combat, up to 3 times. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

name: Turbo-Drain 5000

spells.description: Equip: Your harmful spells and abilities have a chance to drain your target's electrical power, dealing 169,393 Nature damage over 5 sec. If the target dies while being drained, you gain 25% movement speed for 5 sec.

description: The 8th Rule of Commerce: Fast goblins are smart goblins!

name: G3T-00t
description: Complete with shock and bludgeoning capabilities.

spells.description:
Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.

name: Loamm Niffen Tabard
description: Give the Niffen a reason to call you smelly.
